TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StaticExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: Implements a markup extension that returns static field and property references.

span.span: Implements a markup extension that returns static field and property references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是標記延伸實作如`{x:Static}`.NET xaml 服務 XAML 語言功能的支援。This class is a markup extension implementation for `{x:Static}` in the .NET XAML services support of XAML language features. XAML 使用量資訊，請參閱[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md). 您通常會使用靜態參考類型，包括從無法具現化在 XAML 中因為類型是靜態的類型從取得靜態值。You typically use static references to obtain static values from types, including from types that cannot be instantiated in XAML because the type is static. 常見的案例範例其中`{x:Static}`適合包含可以視為常數，例如固定的數學值或狀態的唯一索引鍵的值。Common examples of cases where `{x:Static}` is useful include values that can be thought of as constants, such as fixed math values or unique keys for states. 所參考的靜態成員沒有來自與 XAML 結構描述內容相關聯的特定架構組件。The static members being referenced do not have to come from specific framework assemblies associated with XAML schema context. 您可以將其他組件和 XAML 用法的 CLR 命名空間對應，然後可以參考靜態成員在 XAML 中使用前置詞對應的型別。You can map other assemblies and CLR namespaces for XAML usage and then can refer to static members of types in XAML using the prefix you mapped.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string member) cil managed

param.name: member
param.span: A string that identifies the member to make a reference to.

span.span: A string that identifies the member to make a reference to.

param.span: This string uses the format prefix:typeName.fieldOrPropertyName.

span.span: This string uses the format prefix:typeName.fieldOrPropertyName.

param.span: prefix is the mapping prefix for a XAML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XAML namespace.

span.span: prefix is the mapping prefix for a XAML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XAML namespace.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided string.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `member`時將其設定，將不評估值。The `member` value is not evaluated when you set it. 如果初始的值不是`null`，則值會被接受。If the initial value is not `null`,then the value is accepted. 實際剖析和評估`member`值會延遲，直到XAML 寫入器處理的延伸使用方式時，會呼叫。The actual parsing and evaluation of the `member` value is deferred until is called when a XAML writer processes an extension usage. 時間、 XAML 結構描述內容通知的類型對應，並可以取得的值。At that time, XAML schema context informs the type mapping and the value can be obtained.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Member { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Member : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a member name string that is used to resolve a static field or property based on the service-provided type resolver.

span.span: Gets or sets a member name string that is used to resolve a static field or property based on the service-provided type resolver.

value.span: 識別要參考之成員的字串。

span.span: A string that identifies the member to make a reference to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串通常會使用格式*前置詞*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*。The string for typically uses the format *prefix*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*. (*前置詞*是 XML 命名空間對應前置詞和要參考未對應至預設 XML 命名空間的靜態值時才需要)。(*prefix* is the mapping prefix for an XML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XML namespace). 字串也可以指定只有成員名稱，因此長時間為也提供。，但請注意，XML 命名空間和前置詞，將不支援這項技術，它型別系統層級運作。The string can also specify only the member name, so long as is also supplied., but note that this technique will not support XML namespaces and prefixes; it is working at the type system level. XAML 使用量資訊，請參閱[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md). 當您將它; 不會評估此值只要值不是`null`將會接受它。This value is not evaluated when you set it; so long as the value is not `null` it will be accepted. 實際剖析和數值的評估會延遲，直到在剖析期間呼叫。The actual parsing and evaluation of the value is deferred until is called during parsing. 在一般案例所使用的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]XAML 處理器，XAML 處理器會型別解析程式的 CLR 型別傳遞做為其服務合約的一部分，並上使用這個解析程式呼叫。Under the normal scenario of use by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor, the XAML processor passes a type resolver for CLR types as part of its service contract, and this resolver is used on the call.

member this.MemberType : Type with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the that defines the static member to return.

span.span: Gets or sets the that defines the static member to return.
The that defines the static member to return.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，支援替代模式，它會傳回靜態成員，根據有簡單的成員名稱，且提供做為其擁有者型別，而非提供完整格式名稱*類型*`.`*成員*。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], supports an alternate mode whereby it can return a static member based on being the simple member name and its owning type supplied as , rather than providing a full name in the form *type*`.`*member*. 型別解析程式仍作用，但在此情況下和基本上結合： `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`。The type resolver still acts, but in this case the and are basically combined: `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`. 請注意，這項技術會支援 XAML 命名空間和首碼。它正在使用支援類型系統，而不是 XAML 類型系統。Note that this technique will not support XAML namespaces and prefixes; it is working against the backing type system, not the XAML type system. 字串通常會使用格式*前置詞*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*。The string for typically uses the format *prefix*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*. (*前置詞*是 XML 命名空間對應前置詞和要參考未對應至預設 XML 命名空間的靜態值時才需要)。(*prefix* is the mapping prefix for an XML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XML namespace). XAML 使用量資訊，請參閱[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md).

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.

param.span: The service provider is expected to provide a service that implements a type resolver ().

span.span: The service provider is expected to provide a service that implements a type resolver ().

summary.span: Returns an object value to set on the property where you apply this extension.

span.span: Returns an object value to set on the property where you apply this extension.

summary.span: For , the return value is the static value that is evaluated for the requested static member.

span.span: For , the return value is the static value that is evaluated for the requested static member.

returns.span: The static value to set on the property where the extension is applied.

span.span: The static value to set on the property where the extension is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支援 XAML 語言功能，而且通常不適合直接呼叫。This method supports XAML language features and is generally not intended to be called directly. 實作 XAML 處理器會使用這個方法正確處理`x:Static`期間建立物件的擴充功能值。The XAML processor implementation uses this method to correctly handle the `x:Static` extension values during object creation. 這項實作依賴為基礎的服務上傳入`serviceProvider`。This implementation relies on services that are based on the passed `serviceProvider`. `serviceProvider` 不能`null`。`serviceProvider` must not be `null`. `serviceProvider`物件来傳回的服務必須是。The `serviceProvider` object is expected to return a service for . 預設 XAML 讀取器和 XAML 寫入器所使用的一般案例中，在適用的服務提供者使用。Under the normal scenario of use by the default XAML readers and XAML writers, a suitable service provider is available. 無效的 XAML 結構描述內容可能會有中斷類型對應的副作用，因此服務。An invalid XAML schema context might have the side effect of breaking type mapping and thus the service. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，支援替代模式，它會傳回靜態成員，根據有簡單的成員名稱，且提供做為其擁有者型別，而非提供完整格式名稱*類型*`.`*成員*。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], supports an alternate mode whereby it can return a static member based on being the simple member name and its owning type supplied as , rather than providing a full name in the form *type*`.`*member*. 型別解析程式仍作用，但在此情況下和基本上結合： `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`。The type resolver still acts, but in this case the and are basically combined: `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`.
